message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $145 for it.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer it to you for $155.
I understand you're trying to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. I'm willing to pay $152 for it.
I've made some concessions, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $153, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $153, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $151 for it.
I've already met you at $153, and you're asking me to go even lower. I'm not comfortable with that. I'll make one final offer: $154, and that's as low as I can go.
I understand you've made a final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $154. I'm willing to pay $152 for it.
